title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 24 May 2009 - XWiki
content:

vmassol - (24/05/2009 09:28): got to go

vmassol - (24/05/2009 12:33): asyd: yes definitely, we have a jira issue to implement some but never came to do it yet so that's cool  
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 12:54

asyd - (24/05/2009 13:09): I just had a little trouble with jmeter. can't the way to create a variable with a random value. There is something, but each time I reference this variable, a new value is computed:/  
asyd - (24/05/2009 13:25): vmassol: done  
tuska joined #xwiki at 13:55

sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 15:16  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 15:19  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:45): sdumitriu : Hi  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:46): Hi arunreddy\_  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:46): I've seen your account  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:46): Ok. Coming to incubator. Still the problem persists.   
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:46): What problem?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:47): Mockups?  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:47): Unable to create new page in mockup space  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:47): yes  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:48): On http://incubator.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Mockups/ I see a panel on the right, with a button: Add UI Mockup  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:48): Do you see it?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:49): OK, try again now  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:49): nope  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:49): got it now  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:49): Thanks  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:50): One more thing. How to use sandbox.  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:50): :)  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 15:51): I'll write an email for that  
arunreddy\_ - (24/05/2009 15:51): ok :)

sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:04): anamarias: Ping  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:05): arunreddy\_\_: Ping  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:06): tharindu\_\_: Ping  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:09): hi  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:09): sdumitriu: PING  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:09): Can you try something?  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:10): yes  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:11): wht am i suppposed to try  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:12): svn co https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/sandbox/gsoc/importexport/  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:13): ok  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:14): done   
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:14): working   
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:15): A    importexport/test  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:15): Checked out revision 20372.  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:15): Can you change the file, and try to commit it?  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:16): ok  
vmassol\_ joined #xwiki at 21:18  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:21): sdumitriu: Done  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:22): Committed revision 20373.  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:22): but why is it asking password twice  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:22): ?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:24): It should only ask it the first time  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:24): ok  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:24): Can you try to change and commit again, to see if it ask the password?  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:24): sure  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:27): Not asking this time  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:27): :)  
vmassol left at 21:32 (Read error: 113 (No route to host))  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:32): Great  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:35): :)  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:35): Are you coming with a detailed mail on how to use it ?  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:35): \*coming up .?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:35): Maybe tomorrow  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:36): OK.  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:36): I'm writing some code now  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 21:36): Thats great. Thanks.  
vmassol\_ left at 21:57 ()  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 21:58): sdumitriu Hi !  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:58): Hi anamarias  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 21:58): i'm so sorry i was out for a bit  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:58): No problem  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 21:58): should I try the svn co ?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 21:59): Wait  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:02): Your URL is https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/sandbox/gsoc/opensocial/  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:03): ok, i got  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:03): A    opensocial/README  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:03): Checked out revision 20375.  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:05): Test the commit by removing the dot from the end of your name inside the README  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:06): ok  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 22:07  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:09): i'm not sure if it worked  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:09): What did it say?  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:09): Checked out revision 20376.  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:10): svn commit?  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:10): hmm, i needed to do an update  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:11): i haven't used so much the command line for synchronizing   
CristinaS joined #xwiki at 22:13  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:13): hi!  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:15): Hi CristinaS  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:15): anamarias: Did it work?  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:15): 1 sec  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:15): sdumitriu: i've done my account at xwiki .. what should be my project url?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:15): Yes, it did  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:15): CristinaS: Creating it now  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:16): ok, thanks  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:16): sdumitriu: ok, it worked  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:19): CristinaS: What name do you prefer?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:19): XOO  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:19): XOOP (pronounced zoop, XWiki OpenOffice Plugin)  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:19): XOOo (OpenOffice org)  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:19): and another question .. how can I customize the manifest file generated by maven?  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:20): which one?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:22): http://maven.apache.org/plugin-developers/cookbook/add-build-time-to-manifest.html  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:22): http://maven.apache.org/guides/mini/guide-manifest.html  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:23): For simple things the second link is easy  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:23): thank you  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:23): So, which name do you prefer?  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:24): i think XOO is the best .. the shortest .. and we all are familiar with it  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:24): is it ok?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:24): K  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:24): Yes  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:28): https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/sandbox/gsoc/xoo/  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:29): k, i try a co  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:30): it worked  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:31): it wasn't necessary to enter my password  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:31): when you commit you'll need it  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:31): No, it asks it on the first commit  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 22:31  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:31): ok  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:32): what will be the maven structure for the sources? : xwiki.org ?   
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:32): xwiki.org.xoo  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:33): org.xwiki.xoo  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:33): ok  
CristinaS - (24/05/2009 22:33): thanks  
tachirei - (24/05/2009 22:33): hi!  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 22:34): org.xwiki.importexport ?? in my case.  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:35): Hi tachirei  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:35): This is for you: http://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/sandbox/gsoc/xoffice/  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:35): Sorry  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:35): https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/sandbox/gsoc/xoffice/  
tachirei - (24/05/2009 22:36): ok, thanks!  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:37): arunreddy\_\_: No, that's too long  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:38): org.xwiki.import is for import functionalities  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:38): The export is not bound to the import  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:38): But concentrate on the import first  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 22:39): ok  
arunreddy\_\_ - (24/05/2009 22:40): so its .. org.xwiki.import ?  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:40): Yes  
tharindu\_\_ - (24/05/2009 22:50): sdumitriu: Hi, I could change and commit, I just tried with adding contact address to README  
tharindu\_\_ - (24/05/2009 22:51): I tried with this URL, https://svn.xwiki.org/svnroot/xwiki/sandbox/  
arunreddy\_\_ is now known as arunreddy ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
tharindu\_\_ - (24/05/2009 22:52): with /gsoc/xmpp  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:52): sdumitriu, will our space be completely independent of any other modules of code (in other locations) ?  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:53): most likely we'll need other modules, how will we keep up to date with the new versions for them ?  
tachirei - (24/05/2009 22:53): sdumitriu: thanks for the account. Everything looks fine.  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:54): Well, maven dependencies are automatically updated  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:54): You will just need to declare the proper dependencies in your pom.xml  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 22:55): They don't need to be in the same place  
anamarias - (24/05/2009 22:56): i should read about maven then

kaaloo joined #xwiki at 23:04  
vnkatesh joined #xwiki at 23:09

vnkatesh - (24/05/2009 23:22): I guess I already have sandbox commit access.

sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 23:22): Leave xeclipse-gsoc alone for the moment

vnkatesh - (24/05/2009 23:23): ok  
vnkatesh - (24/05/2009 23:23): thanks  
sdumitriu - (24/05/2009 23:23): And Fabio also

vnkatesh - (24/05/2009 23:24): I guess fabio has incorporated all the changes, do check him for surity  
vnkatesh - (24/05/2009 23:24): \*check with him
